verbose_text: HG sensitized the cardiomyocytes to H/R injury, which was manifested as reduced cardiomyocyte viability (XREF_FIG), and increased LDH (XREF_FIG) and MDA leels (XREF_FIG) (all P < 0.05 vs. NG + H/R group).
evidence: HG sensitized the cardiomyocytes to H/R injury, which was manifested as reduced cardiomyocyte viability ( XREF_FIG ), and increased LDH
